item.title: Hawley vows to hold Democrats' 'feet to the fire' with new government shutdown funding bills
item.description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., is introducing legislation to fund Farm Service Agency and SNAP programs amid the government shutdown.

item.title: Coast Guard surges to Rio Grande in new border security mission, Operation River Wall
item.description: The Coast Guard launched Operation River Wall along eastern Texas' Rio Grande to support President Donald Trump's border security mission.
